name: Grupo Portugues da Associação Internacional para a Proteção da Propriedade Intelectual
membership: AIPPI - Association Internationale pour la Protecion de la Proprieté Intellectuelle - http://aippi.org/
goal: Promote the use and improvement Intellectual Property systems in Portugal and Europe

euInitiatives: Intellectual property, trademarks, patents, designs, geographical indications, Innovation legislation and sytems
